list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the flat cutting edge of a knife, saw, or other tool or weapon.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: cut cleanly using a sharp blade
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cắt sạch bằng lưỡi dao sắc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the flat, wide section of an implement or device such as an oar or a propeller.
a shoulder bone in a cut of meat, or the cut of meat itself.
a long, narrow leaf of grass or another similar plant.
a dashing or energetic young man.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the director, a young blade in an oversized suit
